trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 타임에 컨트롤의 보기에서 발생 한 이벤트의 종류를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 이 클래스는 상속 될 수 없습니다.

trans-unit.source: A ViewEvent object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: ViewEvent에 개체가 제공 되는 디자이너 구성 요소 디자인 호스트에서 예를 들어 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]컨트롤의 디자인 타임 보기에서 특정 사용자 작업으로 발생 한 이벤트를 발생 시킬 때, 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트를 처리 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>메서드를 대리자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체를 매개 변수로.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a ViewEvent object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>클래스는 ViewEvent 개체입니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static ViewEvent fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>메서드 비교 대리자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>이벤트를 발생 시킨 동작의 형식을 결정 하는 정적 ViewEvent 필드 속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances: - You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트는 다음과 같은 경우에 발생 하는 예를 들어:-디자인 화면에서 영역을 클릭 합니다.

trans-unit.source: - The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: -디자이너 디자인 화면에 컨트롤을 그립니다.

trans-unit.source: - You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: -입력 하거나 템플릿 편집 컨트롤에 대 한 모드를 종료 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>처리 하는 기본 대리자를 제공 하는 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 사용자 지정 컨트롤 디자이너 재정의 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>디자인 화면에 컨트롤에 대 한 이벤트를 처리 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 호스트를 초기화 한 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체를 개체의 디자인 화면에 다음 전달 동작의 종류에 대 한는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>위임.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>의 속성은 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>개체 동작의 유형을 나타냅니다:- <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>이벤트.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>속성 동작의 종류와 관련 된 이벤트 인수를 제공 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: 디자이너 영역에서 클릭에 대 한 view 이벤트가 발생 했음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>메서드 비교 대리자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>속성과 정적 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>필드를 이벤트를 발생 시킨 동작의 형식을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Click to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>개체가 같은지를 클릭 하 여 디자인 화면에서 영역을 클릭 했음을 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스는 기본 제공 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>위임.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Click, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 호출 하는 이벤트 유형이 Click 이면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에서 파생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>재정의 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>를 처리할 메서드를 영역에 대해 이벤트를 클릭 하 여 디자인 타임에.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 인수는 있는 경우 디자이너 영역을 클릭 한을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 디자인 화면에 컨트롤을 그리기 위한 뷰 이벤트 발생 했음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>메서드 비교 대리자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>속성과 정적 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>필드를 이벤트를 발생 시킨 동작의 형식을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Paint to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>개체가 같은지를 그리기 컨트롤 디자인 화면에 대 한 paint 이벤트를 나타냅니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스는 기본 제공 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>위임.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Paint, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 대리자를 호출 하는 이벤트 유형이 페인트 이면는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 클래스에서 파생 되는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>재정의 클래스는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>를 처리할 메서드를 영역에 대해 이벤트를 클릭 하 여 디자인 타임에.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: 컨트롤 디자이너의 템플릿 모드를 변경 하기 위한 뷰 이벤트 발생 했음을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>메서드 비교 대리자는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>속성과 정적 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>필드를 이벤트를 발생 시킨 동작의 형식을 결정 합니다.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to TemplateModeChanged to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>개체가 같은지를 디자인 화면에 컨트롤에 대 한 템플릿 편집 모드 변경 되었음을 나타내는 TemplateModeChanged.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>클래스는 기본 제공 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>위임.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: If the event type is TemplateModeChanged, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 이벤트 유형이 TemplateModeChanged 인 대리자에 대 한 값이 설정 된 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>속성.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 파생 된 사용자 지정 디자이너는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>클래스 재정의할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>템플릿 편집 컨트롤의 디자인 화면에 대 한 모드 변경 될 때 추가 처리를 수행 하는 메서드.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.
